name: malingerer
content:

a person who pretends to be ill in order to avoid having to work: I'm sure she thinks I'm a malingerer. Psychological tests performed by experts can often identify malingerers. See
malinger
More examplesFewer examplesHe was a malingerer who feigned illness. People thought that he could possibly be a malingerer.It can be difficult for commanders to tell the malingerers from the truly ill.
